title: World Record - Novel Updates
tags: Brother Complex   Depictions of Cruelty   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Magic   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Special Abilities   Tragic Past   Vampires   Younger Sisters
author: Mori Takuwan   森たくわん
description:
Year 2140, the world is full of superpowers.

Those who can create fire.

Those who can create water.

Those who use supernatural power.

Those who use sorcery.

And the only one without powers

Originally, he should be weak.

But somehow, he is — considerably strong.>
